#include<iostream>
#include<cstdio>
#define gc getchar_unlocked
using namespace std;
inline int read()
	{
		long int t=0;
		char ch;
		ch=gc();
		while(ch<'0'||ch>'9')
		ch=gc();
		while(ch<='9'&&ch>='0')
		{
			t=(t<<3)+(t<<1)+ch-'0';
			ch=gc();
		}
		return t;
	}
int main()
{	
	long int t,n;
	//scanf("%ld",&t);
	t=read();
	while(t)
	{
		t--;
		//scanf("%ld",&n);
		n=read();
		if(n%2==0 || n%3==0)
		{
			printf("YES\n");
		}	
		else
		{
			printf("NO\n");
		}
	}
	return 0;
}
